Tetsusaiga is Stolen! Showdown at Naraku`s Castle
Narakus Schloss
Teissaiga a été volé
Cselszövés
Nusumareta Tessaiga Taiketsu Naraku no Shiro!
El robo del colmillo de acero
episode.summary: Sango steals the Tetsusaiga and is led to Naraku`s castle. Sango tries to use the opportunity to kill Naraku, but she is seriously injured by an attack from Kohaku. Inuyasha and the gang catch up to her, but they are in danger from Naraku`s miasma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ついに折れた鉄砕牙
Tetsusaiga Breaks
Tessaiga zerbricht
Tessaiga brisée !
A törött kard
Tsui ni Oreta Tessaiga
Colmillo de Acero se rompe
episode.summary: Kikyo gave the sacred jewel shards she had stolen from Kagome to Naraku. She appears before Inuyasha and tells him not to kill her until she is wiped out along with the Shikon Jewel and Naraku. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 珊瑚の苦悩と琥珀の命
Sango`s Suffering and Kohaku`s Life
Sangos Qual und Kohakus Leben
La souffrance de Sango et la vie de Kohaku
A megtalált testvér
Sango no Kunou to Kohaku no Inochi
El sufrimiento de Sango y la vida de Kohaku
episode.summary: Sango`s younger brother, Kohaku, who`s supposed to be dead, is alive. Naraku reveals that Kohaku is living because of a sacred jewel shard that is planted in his back. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破られた風の傷
The Wind Scar, Defeated
Die zerbrochene Windnarbe
L`échec du Kaze no Kizu
Erőfölény
Yaburareta Kaze no Kizu
El viento cortante es vencido
episode.summary: Kanna`s mirror fails to absorb Kagome`s soul, probably because of its size, but it reflects Inuyasha`s Wind Scar, the Tetsusaiga`s special technique. Inuyasha is injured by the blast of wind blasted back at him. Then Naraku appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過酷な罠にかかった弥勒
Miroku Falls Into A Dangerous Trap!
Miroku in der Falle
Miroku tombe dans un terrible piège
Sarokba szorítva
Kakoku na Wana ni Kakatta Miroku
Miroku cae en una cruel trampa
episode.summary: A demon injures Miroku`s Wind Tunnel. Miroku visits the temple of Mushin, the man who raised him, for help treating the injury. Mushin is possessed by an Urn Grub and attacks Miroku. Furthermore, Miroku is paralyzed and is surrounded by many demons. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神楽の舞と神無の鏡
Kagura`s Dance and Kanna`s Mirror
Auftritt der beiden Schwestern
Danse de Kagura, le miroir de Kanna
A varázstükör
Kagura no Mai to Kanna no Kagami
La danza de Kagura y el espejo de Kanna
episode.summary: Miroku is reunited with Koharu, a girl he once made advances on. He leaves her in a certain village, where Kanna, the older sister of Kagura, appears. Kanna steals Koharu`s soul with a soul-sucking mirror, and Koharu is manipulated along with the villagers into attacking Inuyasha and the others. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 水神が支配する闇の湖
The Lake of the Evil Water God
Der See des bösen Wassergottes
Le lac des ténèbres gouverné par le dieu de l`eau
A csaló vízikígyó
Suijin ga Shihai Suru Yami no Mizuumi
El espíritu maligno del agua
episode.summary: Inuyasha and the gang meet Taromaru, the son of a village leader. They go to the Temple of the Water God, where children are being sacrificed. The Water God has a sacred treasure and toys around with the group. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風使い神楽の妖艶なる罠
The Deadly Trap of the Wind Sorceress, Kagura
Kagura, die Windherrscherin
Le piège mortel de Kagura, la sorcière du vent
A nagy összecsapás
Kazetsukai Kagura no Youennaru Wana
Kagura el espíritu de los vientos
episode.summary: At the end of a desperate struggle, Koga corners Inuyasha, but he is extremely weakened by the poisonous shard in his arm. Kagura appears and controls the wind in the battlefield. Inuyasha stands up, but she tosses him about. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ついに明かされた四魂の秘密
The Secret of the Sacred Jewel Revealed!
Das Geheimnis des "Juwels der vier Seelen"
Le secret de la perle de Shikon
Az ékkő titka
Tsui ni Akasareta Shikon no Himitsu
El secreto de Shikon
episode.summary: Sango reveals the secret story of the Shikon Jewel`s birth. Midoriko, a priestess with powerful spiritual powers, fused with many demons after a battle to the death. She absorbed the souls of the demons into her own, punched out her soul, and died. Her soul is the Shikon Jewel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奈落の謀略をうち破れ!
Naraku`s Insidious Plot!
Narakus heimtückischer Plan
L`affreux complot de Naraku
Gonosz csapda
Naraku no Bouryaku o Uchiyabure!
El engaño de Naraku
episode.summary: Sango fights Inuyasha, believing him to be her enemy. Naraku`s plan is to have her fight to the death using the power of the Shikon Jewel shard. But Sango listens to Kagome and is no longer suspicious of Inuyasha. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖怪退治屋 珊瑚登場!
Enter Sango, the Demon Slayer
Die Dämonenjägerin Sango
Sango, la chasseuse de démons
Szellemirtók
Youkaitaijiya Sango Toujou!
La exterminadora de monstruos
episode.summary: Sango, a demon slayer, is invited to Hitomi Castle along with her father, the leader of the demon slayers, and her younger brother, Kohaku. But it is a trap. Meanwhile, the undefended village is attacked by a horde of demons and annihilated. Naraku takes the Shikon Jewel shards that they had been gathering and leaves. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仕組まれた死闘
Trapped In a Duel To The Death!
Kouga gegen Inuyasha
Contraint de se battre à mort
A szélboszorkány
Shikumareta Shitou
Un combate arreglado
episode.summary: Kagura, a wind-using demon, used rumors of Shikon Jewel shards to draw out demon wolf tribe members and kill them. She lures Inuyasha and the gang out and attacks them with the corpses of the demon wolf tribe members. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: はなれて通うふたりの気持ち
Two Hearts, One Mind
Trennungsschmerz
Loin des yeux mais près du cœur
Civakodók
Hanarete Kayou Futari no Kimochi
Un sentimiento compartido
episode.summary: Kagome is angry that Inuyasha is suspicious of her relationship with Koga and returns to the present day. She goes back to school for the first time in a while, where she has to deal with the advances of yet another suitor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かごめに惚れたあいつ
The Man Who Fell In Love With Kagome
Kagomes Verehrer
Celui qui est amoureux de Kagome
Riválisok
Kagome ni Horeta Aitsu
El chico que se enamoró de Aome
episode.summary: Koga and the demon wolf tribe begin their attack on the Birds of Paradise. Kagome senses that the sacred jewel shard is in the mouth of the brothers who lead the Birds of Paradise and tells Koga. Koga and the Bird of Paradise brothers fight for each other`s shards. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かごめ略奪! 超速の妖狼 鋼牙
Kagome Kidnapped by Koga, the Wolf-Demon
Kagome bei den Wölfen
Le démon-loup Koga a kidnappé Kagome
A falka
Kagome Ryakudatsu! Chousoku no Yourou Kouga
Koga, el veloz
episode.summary: Koga is the young leader of the demon wolf tribe, whose wolf minions were killed by Inuyasha. He places Shikon Jewel shards in his arms and legs, which he uses as weapons, making him an even match with Inuyasha. But it`s Kagome who intrigues him… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名刀が選ぶ真の使い手
The True Owner of the Great Sword
Das Geheimnis der Windnarbe
Le véritable propriétaire du fabuleux sabre
A kis árva
Meitou ga Erabu Shin no Tsukaite
La espada elige a su verdadero dueño
